lessons.japanese: 外国語は１年やそこらで身につけられるものではない。
lessons.english: A foreign language cannot be mastered in a year or so.

lessons.japanese: 一年やそこらで英語をマスターすることは不可能だ。
lessons.english: It is impossible to master English in a year or so.

lessons.japanese: もう２週間かそこらで梅雨も終わるでしょう。
lessons.english: The rainy season will be over in another two weeks or so.

lessons.japanese: そこらじゅう蚊に刺されてかゆくてしょうがない。
lessons.english: I got bit by mosquitoes all over this area, and it itches so badly I can't stand it.

lessons.japanese: この本を読み終えるには１週間かそこらかかるだろう。
lessons.english: It'll take a week or so to read through this book.

lessons.japanese: 一週間かそこらでよくなるでしょう。
lessons.english: You will get well in a week or so.
I'll be back in twenty minutes or so.

lessons.japanese: １時間かそこらで帰ってきます。
lessons.english: I'll be back in an hour or so.
You can buy it for a thousand yen or so.

lessons.japanese: そこらへんは、男子と女子とでは違うんだってば。
lessons.english: Obviously that's different for men and women.

lessons.japanese: そこらへんは、男子と女子とでは違うんだってば。
lessons.english: Well, in that area, of course things are different for men and women.

lessons.japanese: 彼女はそこらにいますか。
